00020 
00021 // Lemur
00022 #include "Param.hpp"
00023 
00024 
00026 void ears::AssociationModel::initSmoothing()
00027 {
00028   std::string smethod;
00029   std::string sparam;
00030   bool autoSmoothing = false;
00031   
00032   smoothingMethod_ = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "smoothingMethod" );
00033   smoothingParam_ = lemur::api::ParamGetDouble( "smoothingParam", 0.0 );
00034   
00035   // setting smoothing parameter automatically
00036   // (if auto smoothing then it's always Dirichlet smoothing)
00037   if ( smoothingParam_ == 0.0 ) {
00038     LOG( logINFO ) << "Estimating smoothing parameter (automatically)";
00039     autoSmoothing = true;
00040     smoothingMethod_ = "dirichlet";
00041     this->setSmoothingAuto();
00042   }
00043   
00044   // display smoothing method and parameter  
00045   if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) { // Dirichlet
00046     smethod = "Dirichlet";
00047     sparam = "beta";
00048   }
00049   if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) { // Jelinek-Mercer
00050     smethod = "Jelinek-Mercer";
00051     sparam = "lambda";
00052   }  
00053   
00054   if ( autoSmoothing )
00055     sparam += ", auto";
00056   
00057   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Smoothing method: " << smethod; 
00058   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Smoothing parameter (" << sparam << "): " << smoothingParam_;
00059 }
